2025-05-08.title: Toyota reports booming sales but stays cautious on profit because of various costs
2025-05-08.description: TOKYO (AP) — Japan’s top automaker Toyota reported record sales for the fiscal year through March on Thursday, but its profit for the latest quarter faltered partly because of a certification scandal. Toyota Motor Corp.’s January-March net profit totaled 664.…

2025-05-08.title: Toyota Warns of Profit Drop as Tariff Chaos Threatens Carmakers
2025-05-08.description: Toyota Motor Corp. is bracing itself for a bumpy year, with the Japanese carmaker warning of a slump in profit as global manufacturers scramble to shield themselves from US President Donald Trump’s tariff turmoil.

2025-05-11.title: Toyota Faces Biggest Hit From Trump Tariffs Among Auto Companies
2025-05-11.description: Toyota Motor Corp. is the biggest carmaker in the world — and also the auto industry’s biggest loser when it comes to projected losses from US President Donald Trump’s trade war.

2025-05-07.title: Japan’s Tycoon Families Seek Buyouts to Evade Investor Pressure
2025-05-07.description: Akio Toyoda’s $42 billion plan to buyout Toyota Industries Corp. is the most dramatic example of a growing trend in Japan of founding families trying to take companies private.
